65.eng-name: Prophetic Commentary on the Qur'an (Tafseer of the Prophet (pbuh))

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "On the Day of Resurrection Abraham will see his father covered with Qatara and Ghabara. (i.e. having a dark face)

chapter.eng-name: "And disgrace me not on the day when (all the creatures) will be resurrected." (V.26:87)
